findings.title: Loss of tokens forever
findings.description: In the transfer and transferFrom functions there is no check for a zero address. If a user transfers his/her tokens to a zero address they will be lost forever and there is no way of retrieving them.

findings.title: Gas savings
findings.description: Declaring functions as external instead of public can save gas.

findings.title: Total Supply
findings.description: The standard is to show the total tokens in circulation when it comes to totalSupply.

findings.title: Require messages
findings.description: Consider adding error messages inside the require statements which will make debugging failed transactions much easier.
